overview: The year is 1967: hundreds of thousands of young people gather in San Francisco to change their destiny and the world during the "summer of love". By 1969, Woodstock has given rise to the modern festival movement. What is left of it fifty years later? This is the art ballet group (La) Horde sceptical study of the modern music festival as a mass ornament and yet another manifestation of the culture industry.
title: Cultes
